main.Query:
Declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) Declare @bigsql varchar(8000)
set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + '] IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[usp_RollBackIncludeExcludeLoansByUploadID]'') AND type in (N''P'', N''PC'')) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_RollBackIncludeExcludeLoansByUploadID] ' exec (@vchSQL)
set @vchSQL =' CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_RollBackIncludeExcludeLoansByUploadID] ( @UploadedID bigint, @DimPoolId bigint, @ExcludeECName nvarchar(100) =''''LoansExclusion'''' , @IncludeECName nvarchar(100) =''''LoansInclusion'''' ) AS Begin
Declare @DimExcludeECID bigint Declare @DimIncludeECID bigint select @DimExcludeECID = DimECID from dbo.tblDimEC where CriteriaName = @ExcludeECName and DimPoolID = @DimPoolId select @DimIncludeECID = DimECID from dbo.tblDimEC where CriteriaName = @IncludeECName and DimPoolID = @DimPoolId
update dbo.tblDimLoan set IncludedAuditLoan = 0 where DimPoolID = @DimPoolId and DimLoanID in ( SELECT fl.DimLoanID FROM dbo.tblUploadedFileDetails AS ufd WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN dbo.tblDimLoan AS fl WITH (nolock) ON ufd.AccountNo = fl.AccountNo where ufd.Included = 1 and fl.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId and UploadID = @UploadedID and ufd.AuditLoan =1 )
update dbo.tblFactLoan set IsIncluded = 1 where DimPoolID= @DimPoolId and DimLoanID in (select DimLoanID from dbo.tblFactLoanECResult where DimPoolID = @DimPoolId and DimECID = @DimExcludeECID)
delete dbo.tblFactLoanECResult where DimPoolID =@DimPoolId -- without and DimECID = @DimExcludeECID delete dbo.tblFactLoanReturnResult where DimPoolID =@DimPoolId -- without and DimECID = @DimExcludeECID delete dbo.tblFactConsolidationECResult where DimPoolID =@DimPoolId delete dbo.tblFactSecurityECResult where DimPoolID =@DimPoolId delete dbo.tblFactLoanSecurityECResult where DimPoolID =@DimPoolId delete dbo.tblFactSecurityReturnResult where DimPoolID =@DimPoolId
delete dbo.tblFactLoan where DimPoolID = @DimPoolId and DimLoanID not in (select DimLoanId from dbo.tblFactConsolidationLoan where LTVPassNo = ''''SourcePass'''' and DimPoolID = @DimPoolId) delete dbo.tblDimLoan where DimPoolID = @DimPoolId and DimLoanID not in (select DimLoanId from dbo.tblFactConsolidationLoan where LTVPassNo = ''''SourcePass'''' and DimPoolID = @DimPoolId) delete dbo.tblFactLoanSecurity where DimPoolID = @DimPoolId and DimLoanID not in (select DimLoanId from dbo.tblFactConsolidationLoan where LTVPassNo = ''''SourcePass'''' and DimPoolID = @DimPoolId) delete dbo.tblFactSecurity where DimPoolID = @DimPoolId and DimSecurityID not in (select DimSecurityID from dbo.tblFactConsolidationSecurity where LTVPassNo = ''''SourcePass'''' and DimPoolID = @DimPoolId) delete dbo.tblDimSecurity where DimPoolID = @DimPoolId and DimSecurityID<>0 and DimSecurityID not in (select DimSecurityID from dbo.tblFactConsolidationSecurity where LTVPassNo = ''''SourcePass'''' and DimPoolID = @DimPoolId)
delete dbo.tblFactConsolidation where LTVPassNo <> ''''SourcePass'''' and DimPoolID = @DimPoolId delete dbo.tblFactConsolidationLoan where LTVPassNo <> ''''SourcePass'''' and DimPoolID = @DimPoolId delete dbo.tblFactConsolidationSecurity where LTVPassNo <> ''''SourcePass'''' and DimPoolID = @DimPoolId
update dbo.tblDimPool set UploadID = null where DimPoolID = @DimPoolId
End'
SET @BigSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; EXEC (@BigSQL)
